item.description:
Kathleen Anderson and yours truly, Betsy Bragg, invite YOU to our Joint Birthday Party and anyone who has a March Birthday. Please come and help us blow out the candles. Kathleen and I are making a large Lemon Birthday Cheesecake to share with you to Celebrate our birthdays. We are happy to be alive & want to celebrate our joy with you!

When:  Monday, March 7, 6 pm at the RNEC/OHS Dinner Speaker Series with LJ Rose (see below for our special event) 

Where:  The United Methodist Church, 430 Walnut St., Newtonville, MA 02453

Register On-line at www.OptimumHealthSolution.org so we know how many Portobello Pesta Pizza and Birthday Cake to make for you to have. 

Raw Fusion: 

Artfully Blending Cooked and Raw Foods

LindaJoy Rose, Ph.D.

Author of “Raw Fusion: Better Living Through Living Foods”

www.rawfusionliving.com

Discussion, Food Demo, Menus & Pot Luck

"Raw Fusion is a hybrid of the best of the raw foods world, intermingled with an informed and conscious mainstream lifestyle.”  Susan Schenck The Live Food Factor

Date: Monday, March 7 2011 

6 p.m. LindaJoy “LJ” Rose prepares Portobello Pesto Pizza. (Make sure to be on time as you won't want to miss this special treat!)

6:15 p.m. to 7 p.m. Raw Food Potluck* Please bring a large salad, fruit bowl, or raw food recipe dish. If unable to bring a dish, pay $10 on line 24 hrs in advance and Betsy will prepare it. *Potluck info: www.meetup.com/rawboston/pages/potlucks

7 p.m. Discussion by Dr. LJ Rose

Cost:  $15 on line www.OptimumHealthSolution.org or $20 at the door.

Location: UNITED METHODIST CHURCH, 430 Walnut St., Newton Highlands, MA

For directions see http://www.optimumhealthsolution.org/directions.htm

Raffle only $5 for a set of 8 Raw Foods – Vegetarianism Permacharts valued at $80

See http://www.permacharts.com/c-8-raw-foods-vegetarianism.aspx, benefits “OHS –Kids”

LindaJoy Rose, Ph.D. is the pioneer of the raw fusion movement, marrying raw foods with a healthy mainstream lifestyle.  She is a raw foods educator and chef around Tampa Bay and also an internationally known author, expert and trainer in the fields of hypnotherapy, subconscious dynamics and Jungian psychology, serving as Director of International Development Of the American Board of Hypnotherapy for many years.  For more information on Dr. Rose visit: www.rawfusionliving.com and www.drljrose.com

In addition to her presentation and tasting of her delicious Portabello Pesta Pizza and talk on Raw Fusion, Dr. LindaJoy Rose will also lead us in a  Life Makeover Therapy™ which reveals your basic life vision and premise operating holographically and at a subconscious level to co-create your current life experience. By identifying this premise and applying a step-by-step plan designed around your unique nature and purpose, you are guided into a successful "Life Makeover".

Dr. Rose is not only a Raw Foods chef and educator at many prominent health food stores in New Jersey, but offers workshops that incorporate the power of the mind combined with making healthier lifestyle choices. Several years ago, she made the personal choice of eating primarily raw foods (80% or higher) and has experienced some extraordinary improvements in her health and life.

For more information contact Betsy Bragg,  Executive Director, Optimum Health Solution, 337 Newton  St. #4, Waltham, MA 02453, 781-899-6664, cell 617-835-2913, Fax 617-663-6868, www.OptimumHealthSolution.org
item.name: FREE slice Pizza & Cake @ OHS Potluck / Speaker: LindaJoy Rose, PhD
